ETYMOLOGY: From Late Latin dentalis, derived from Latin dens (genitive dentis) meaning 'tooth'.

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Relating to the teeth or to the profession and practice of dentistry.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 关于牙齿的；牙科的；牙医的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: It is important to maintain good dental hygiene to prevent cavities.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 保持良好的口腔卫生对于预防蛀牙非常重要。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: (Of a consonant) articulated by the tip or blade of the tongue touching the back of the upper front teeth.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: (语音学) 齿音的；舌尖抵上齿背发音的（如西班牙语中的 /t/）。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The English 'th' sounds (/θ/ and /ð/) are often classified as dental fricatives.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 英语中的“th”音（/θ/ 和 /ð/）通常被归类为齿擦音。
